body: Hey guys! Just wondering what is the difference between the PVP KD and the normal KD?
body_tagged: Hey guys! Just wondering what is the difference between the PVP KD and the normal KD?
title: Two KD's?

replies.body:
K/D is just bland, kill death ratio.
PvP K/D is kills and deaths from actual pvp.
So, if you were spleefed out, you spleefed someone, or you were knocked into the void(I think), it wouldn't count for your pvp KD.
replies.body_tagged:
K/D is just bland, kill death ratio.
PvP K/D is kills and deaths from actual pvp.
So, if you were spleefed out, you spleefed someone, or you were knocked into the void(I think), it wouldn't count for your pvp KD.

replies.body: pvp Kd only counts the deaths by players, not for example hit the ground too hard
replies.body_tagged: pvp Kd only counts the deaths by players, not for example hit the ground too hard

replies.body: PvP K/D is basically the times you come in combat with someone and you get killed by someone, normal K/D is kill and death ratio of everything together, meaning kills and the deaths you have gotten in everyway you can.
replies.body_tagged: PvP K/D is basically the times you come in combat with someone and you get killed by someone, normal K/D is kill and death ratio of everything together, meaning kills and the deaths you have gotten in everyway you can.

replies.body: I think PvP KD doesn't take out knocked out of the world, because in essence you are still being killed by the player.
replies.body_tagged: I think PvP KD doesn't take out knocked out of the world, because in essence you are still being killed by the player.
